title: Ben Gurney's Dream
description: A fantasy composite stereoview photograph consisting of hundreds of portraits of noted peronalities form the 1860\'s - 1880\'s era.  Represented in this picture are the likenesses of noted actors and actresses, singers, divines, military heroes, statesmen and men and women of literature and science.  At the lower right of the image, Ben Gurney(Jeremiah Gurney\'s son and successor) is posed with his large wet-plate camera; from wet plate negative
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
